<title>Best Of Bruce Springsteen | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Best Of Bruce Springsteen is a collection of original songs spanning his storied 50-year recording career, bringing staples of Bruce's live shows, best-selling hits, and recent releases together in one set for the first time." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/best-of-bruce-springsteen/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Best Of Bruce Springsteen" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Best Of Bruce Springsteen is a collection of original songs spanning his storied 50-year recording career, from 1973's Greeting from Asbury Park, NJ to 2020's Letter To You, bringing staples of Bruce's live shows, best-selling hits, and recent releases together in one set for the first time. The album -- with cover shot by Eric Meola from the Born To Run sessions, and new liner notes by Erik Flannigan -- comes in 18-track 2LP and 1CD and an expanded 31-song digital deluxe version." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/best-of-bruce-springsteen/" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />

<meta name="twitter:description" content="Best Of Bruce Springsteen is a collection of original songs spanning his storied 50-year recording career, from 1973's Greeting from Asbury Park, NJ to 2020's Letter To You, bringing staples of Bruce's live shows, best-selling hits, and recent releases together in one set for the first time. The album -- with cover shot by Eric Meola from the Born To Run sessions, and new liner notes by Erik Flannigan -- comes in 18-track 2LP and 1CD and an expanded 31-song digital deluxe version." />

yoast_head_json.title: Best Of Bruce Springsteen | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Best Of Bruce Springsteen is a collection of original songs spanning his storied 50-year recording career, bringing staples of Bruce's live shows, best-selling hits, and recent releases together in one set for the first time.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Best Of Bruce Springsteen is a collection of original songs spanning his storied 50-year recording career, from 1973's Greeting from Asbury Park, NJ to 2020's Letter To You, bringing staples of Bruce's live shows, best-selling hits, and recent releases together in one set for the first time. The album -- with cover shot by Eric Meola from the Born To Run sessions, and new liner notes by Erik Flannigan -- comes in 18-track 2LP and 1CD and an expanded 31-song digital deluxe version.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Best Of Bruce Springsteen is a collection of original songs spanning his storied 50-year recording career, from 1973's Greeting from Asbury Park, NJ to 2020's Letter To You, bringing staples of Bruce's live shows, best-selling hits, and recent releases together in one set for the first time. The album -- with cover shot by Eric Meola from the Born To Run sessions, and new liner notes by Erik Flannigan -- comes in 18-track 2LP and 1CD and an expanded 31-song digital deluxe version.
